subset_circle_of_unitary:
theorem spectrum.subset_circle_of_unitary {u : E} (h : u ∈ unitary E) : spectrum 𝕜 u ⊆ metric.sphere 0 1 :=
  unitary.spectrum_subset_circle ⟨u, h⟩
#align spectrum.subset_circle_of_unitary spectrum.subset_circle_of_unitary
spectrum_subset_circle:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/-
Copyright (c) 2022 Jireh Loreaux. All rights reserved.
Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Jireh Loreaux
-/
theorem unitary.spectrum_subset_circle (u : unitary E) : spectrum 𝕜 (u : E) ⊆ metric.sphere 0 1 :=
  by
  nontriviality E
  refine' fun k hk => mem_sphere_zero_iff_norm.mpr (le_antisymm _ _)
  · simpa only [cstar_ring.norm_coe_unitary u] using norm_le_norm_of_mem hk
  · rw [← unitary.coe_to_units_apply u] at hk
    have hnk := ne_zero_of_mem_of_unit hk
    rw [← inv_inv (unitary.toUnits u), ← spectrum.map_inv, Set.mem_inv] at hk
    have : («expr‖ ‖» k)⁻¹ ≤ «expr‖ ‖» ↑(unitary.toUnits u)⁻¹
    simpa only [norm_inv] using norm_le_norm_of_mem hk
    simpa using inv_le_of_inv_le (norm_pos_iff.mpr hnk) this
#align unitary.spectrum_subset_circle unitary.spectrum_subset_circle
spectral_radius_eq_nnnorm:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖₊» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⋆» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ennreal -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖₊» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ennreal -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℂ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⋆» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℂ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖₊» -/
theorem is_star_normal.spectral_radius_eq_nnnorm (a : A) [is_star_normal a] :
    spectral_radius (exprℂ) a = «expr‖ ‖₊» a :=
  by
  refine' (ennreal.pow_strict_mono two_ne_zero).injective _
  have heq :
    (fun n : ℕ => («expr‖ ‖₊» ((«expr ⋆» a * a) ^ n) ^ (1 / n : exprℝ) : ennreal)) =
      (fun x => x ^ 2) ∘ fun n : ℕ => («expr‖ ‖₊» (a ^ n) ^ (1 / n : exprℝ) : ennreal) :=
    by
    funext
    rw [function.comp_apply, ← rpow_nat_cast, ← rpow_mul, mul_comm, rpow_mul, rpow_nat_cast, ← coe_pow, sq, ←
      nnnorm_star_mul_self, Commute.mul_pow (star_comm_self' a), star_pow]
  have h₂ :=
    ((ennreal.continuous_pow 2).tendsto (spectral_radius (exprℂ) a)).comp
      (spectrum.pow_nnnorm_pow_one_div_tendsto_nhds_spectral_radius a)
  rw [← HEq] at h₂
  convert tendsto_nhds_unique h₂ (pow_nnnorm_pow_one_div_tendsto_nhds_spectral_radius («expr ⋆» a * a))
  rw [(is_self_adjoint.star_mul_self a).spectral_radius_eq_nnnorm, sq, nnnorm_star_mul_self, coe_mul]
#align is_star_normal.spectral_radius_eq_nnnorm is_star_normal.spectral_radius_eq_nnnorm
norm_apply_le:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/-- A star algebra homomorphism of complex C⋆-algebras is norm contractive. -/
theorem norm_apply_le (a : A) : «expr‖ ‖» (φ a : B) ≤ «expr‖ ‖» a :=
  nnnorm_apply_le φ a
#align norm_apply_le norm_apply_le
nnnorm_apply_le:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖₊» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖₊» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℂ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℂ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖₊» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖₊» -/
/-- A star algebra homomorphism of complex C⋆-algebras is norm contractive. -/
theorem nnnorm_apply_le (a : A) : «expr‖ ‖₊» (φ a : B) ≤ «expr‖ ‖₊» a :=
  by
  suffices ∀ s : A, is_self_adjoint s → «expr‖ ‖₊» (φ s) ≤ «expr‖ ‖₊» s by
    exact
      nonneg_le_nonneg_of_sq_le_sq zero_le'
        (by simpa only [nnnorm_star_mul_self, map_star, map_mul] using this _ (is_self_adjoint.star_mul_self a))
  · intro s hs
    simpa only [hs.spectral_radius_eq_nnnorm, (hs.star_hom_apply φ).spectral_radius_eq_nnnorm, coe_le_coe] using
      show spectral_radius (exprℂ) (φ s) ≤ spectral_radius (exprℂ) s from
        supᵢ_le_supᵢ_of_subset (alg_hom.spectrum_apply_subset φ s)
#align nnnorm_apply_le nnnorm_apply_le
mem_spectrum_eq_re:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℂ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℂ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℂ -/
/-- Any element of the spectrum of a selfadjoint is real. -/
theorem self_adjoint.mem_spectrum_eq_re [StarModule (exprℂ) A] (a : self_adjoint A) {z : exprℂ}
    (hz : z ∈ spectrum (exprℂ) (a : A)) : z = z.re :=
  a.prop.mem_spectrum_eq_re hz
#align self_adjoint.mem_spectrum_eq_re self_adjoint.mem_spectrum_eq_re
coe_re_map_spectrum:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℂ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℂ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr '' » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℂ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℂ -/
/-- The spectrum of a selfadjoint is real -/
theorem self_adjoint.coe_re_map_spectrum [StarModule (exprℂ) A] (a : self_adjoint A) :
    spectrum (exprℂ) (a : A) = («expr '' » (coe ∘ re) (spectrum (exprℂ) (a : A)) : set (exprℂ)) :=
  a.property.coe_re_map_spectrum
#align self_adjoint.coe_re_map_spectrum self_adjoint.coe_re_map_spectrum
